title: Rustâ€™s most popular framework just got a major upgrade
transcript:
WEBVTT

00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:04.680
 If you've been learning Rust, you must have heard of Rocket, Rust's most popular web

00:00:04.680 --> 00:00:09.040
 framework. However, if you've looked into this framework, you probably know it has one

00:00:09.040 --> 00:00:14.360
 major issue. There have been numerous reddit posts and online threads pointing out Rocket's

00:00:14.360 --> 00:00:19.800
 incredibly slow pace of development and questioning if Rocket is still the right framework of choice

00:00:19.800 --> 00:00:25.160
 for Rust developers. The good news is, just last week, a brand new major release of Rocket

00:00:25.160 --> 00:00:29.600
 was announced, along with a newly proposed governance model, which I'll go over in this

00:00:29.600 --> 00:00:34.040
 video. At the end, I'll give you my personal view on whether Rust developers should commit

00:00:34.040 --> 00:00:40.680
 to this popular framework or just forget about it. Rocket was created in 2016, just one year

00:00:40.680 --> 00:00:45.680
 after Rust's first stable release, and it rapidly dominated over other web frameworks

00:00:45.680 --> 00:00:51.880
 because of its unique focus on speed, type safety, and its simple API powered by Rust's

00:00:51.880 --> 00:00:57.000
 system. Unfortunately, this success was short-lived and the project took a downhill trajectory

00:00:57.000 --> 00:01:01.640
 for quite a while. Development crawled to a halt with no major version being released

00:01:01.640 --> 00:01:07.840
 in over 4 years. In a GitHub PR comment, the creator and sole maintainer of Rocket, Sergio,

00:01:07.840 --> 00:01:12.240
 mentioned that due to difficulties in his personal life, he didn't have much time to work on

00:01:12.240 --> 00:01:17.880
 the project. However, this situation was not communicated well to the broader Rust community.

00:01:17.880 --> 00:01:22.080
 Many members slowly lost hope in Rocket and started suggesting other frameworks like

00:01:22.080 --> 00:01:26.920
 Actick's web and Axum. And in May of 2023, Rocket was removed from

00:01:26.920 --> 00:01:32.760
 rewebyet.org, a website that points Rust newcomers to recommended libraries and frameworks

00:01:32.760 --> 00:01:38.280
 for web development in Rust. But just when all hope for Rocket's future seemed lost,

00:01:38.280 --> 00:01:42.640
 last week two major announcements were made, a new governance structure for the project

00:01:42.640 --> 00:01:48.640
 moving forward, and the highly anticipated release of Rocket version 0.5. In a blog post

00:01:48.640 --> 00:01:52.840
 titled "Building a Better Foundation for Rocket's Future," Sergio acknowledged that

00:01:52.840 --> 00:01:57.360
 Rocket's recent development has been nothing short of erratic and four years went by without

00:01:57.360 --> 00:02:02.840
 a major release. The community rightfully voiced its disappointment and concern and was generally

00:02:02.840 --> 00:02:08.000
 not happy with Rocket. Sergio went on to take full responsibility, stating that he didn't

00:02:08.000 --> 00:02:12.520
 lead the project adequately, and even though life events pulled him away from the project,

00:02:12.520 --> 00:02:16.920
 he could have done more to communicate that. To make sure this never happens again, Sergio

00:02:16.920 --> 00:02:22.400
 announced plans for a new independent nonprofit foundation designed to support and bolster

00:02:22.400 --> 00:02:27.840
 Rocket's development, increase transparency, and diversify leadership. Going forward,

00:02:27.840 --> 00:02:32.920
 this foundation would be responsible for governing Rocket and dictating its trajectory, the goal

00:02:32.920 --> 00:02:38.040
 being to distribute control and prevent a single person from stalling development. Alongside

00:02:38.040 --> 00:02:43.480
 this announcement, Rocket version 0.5 was released, with some highly anticipated features

00:02:43.480 --> 00:02:48.480
 finally landing. This version introduced two major features, the first being support for

00:02:48.480 --> 00:02:54.720
 stable Rust. Rocket now compiles and builds on stable Rust, which will improve adoption,

00:02:54.720 --> 00:02:59.840
 make maintenance easier, and make builds more reliable. The second major feature is support

00:02:59.840 --> 00:03:05.520
 for Async.io. You can now write Async route handlers, which is a significant improvement,

00:03:05.520 --> 00:03:10.520
 enabling concise, readable, and maintainable asynchronous code, enhancing the framework's

00:03:10.520 --> 00:03:16.320
 performance and scalability for I/O bound tasks, and making it easier to integrate with various

00:03:16.320 --> 00:03:21.440
 libraries and frameworks within the Rust ecosystem. Some of the other features introduced were

00:03:21.440 --> 00:03:27.000
 support for streams, server side events, and web sockets. This news makes me very excited

00:03:27.000 --> 00:03:32.200
 about the future of Rocket. Rocket was the first Rust framework I ever tried, and it made building

00:03:32.200 --> 00:03:36.880
 Rust servers really enjoyable for me. However, at this point, would I generally recommend

00:03:36.880 --> 00:03:41.720
 this framework given its rocky history. If your project is already using Rocket, then

00:03:41.720 --> 00:03:46.220
 I think it makes sense to stick with it. Switching frameworks can be a headache, especially

00:03:46.220 --> 00:03:51.000
 for larger code bases. Luckily, you don't have to. Given the new major release of Rocket

00:03:51.000 --> 00:03:55.360
 and the new governance model, I'm hopeful that the framework has a bright future. On

00:03:55.360 --> 00:04:00.240
 the other hand, if you're starting a new project, then I would personally go with Axum. Axum

00:04:00.240 --> 00:04:05.520
 is built by the Tokyo team, and unsurprisingly has a deep integration with Tokyo. It's also

00:04:05.520 --> 00:04:11.000
 the new Cool Kid web framework for Rust, and is gaining popularity rapidly. Actick's web

00:04:11.000 --> 00:04:15.360
 is another solid choice, especially if you're looking for a framework that's mature and

00:04:15.360 --> 00:04:19.520
 battle tested. And given the recent news, I think Rocket is still a good choice for new

00:04:19.520 --> 00:04:24.280
 projects. I actually use Rocket to implement the web server project in the Rust developer

00:04:24.280 --> 00:04:28.680
 bootcamp. Recently, I've been working on rewriting the project in Axum, but it's good

00:04:28.680 --> 00:04:32.840
 to know that I can keep both versions. If you want to learn how to implement a web server

00:04:32.840 --> 00:04:37.960
 in Rust using Rocket or Axum, head over to let's get rusty dot com slash bootcamp to

00:04:37.960 --> 00:04:41.920
 accelerate your Rust journey. Let me know what you guys think about this news in the comment

00:04:41.920 --> 00:04:46.120
 section below and subscribe to the channel for more Rust content. Hope you've enjoyed

00:04:46.120 --> 00:04:48.120
 the video and remember to stay rusty.

00:04:48.120 --> 00:04:49.120
 .

00:04:49.120 --> 00:04:50.120
 .

00:04:51.120 --> 00:04:52.120
 .

00:04:53.120 --> 00:04:54.120
 .

00:04:54.120 --> 00:05:04.120
 [BLANK_AUDIO]

title: Rust 1.74.0
transcript:
WEBVTT

00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:06.160
 In this video, I'm going to cover the latest release of Rust, version 1.74.0, which includes

00:00:06.160 --> 00:00:12.400
 three exciting updates, cargo lint configuration, cargo registry authentication, and improved

00:00:12.400 --> 00:00:14.000
 opaque return types.

00:00:14.000 --> 00:00:16.080
 With that said, let's get rusty.

00:00:16.080 --> 00:00:19.920
 The first major update in this release is cargo lint configuration.

00:00:19.920 --> 00:00:24.320
 Previously, if you wanted to configure lints from the Rust compiler or other tools like

00:00:24.320 --> 00:00:28.740
 Clippy, you would either have to set the Rust flag's environmental variable, which would

00:00:28.740 --> 00:00:33.360
 affect the entire build or define crate level attributes in your source code.

00:00:33.360 --> 00:00:38.600
 As of this release, you can now configure crate level attributes in your cargo.toml file.

00:00:38.600 --> 00:00:42.700
 This is nice because you can keep everything in one place and avoid clutter in your source

00:00:42.700 --> 00:00:43.700
 code.

00:00:43.700 --> 00:00:48.560
 Lens can also be configured in a workspace's dot lint's table and inherited by workspace

00:00:48.560 --> 00:00:53.520
 members by setting workspace equal to true underneath the lint configuration.

00:00:53.520 --> 00:00:57.660
 The second major update in this release is cargo registry authentication.

00:00:57.660 --> 00:01:02.220
 When defining third-party dependencies in your project, cargo fetches those dependencies

00:01:02.220 --> 00:01:03.720
 from a registry.

00:01:03.720 --> 00:01:08.840
 A registry is a centralized repository where developers can publish and share their Rust

00:01:08.840 --> 00:01:13.760
 code, and others can easily discover and include these crates in their own projects.

00:01:13.760 --> 00:01:18.560
 The default registry is crates.io, which is a public registry maintained by the Rust

00:01:18.560 --> 00:01:19.560
 community.

00:01:19.560 --> 00:01:24.400
 But you may want to pull dependencies from a custom private repository for various reasons.

00:01:24.400 --> 00:01:29.960
 For example, your company may have internal dependencies or require strict security measures.

00:01:29.960 --> 00:01:35.700
 Fetching dependencies from public registries like crates.io can be done with simple, unauthenticated

00:01:35.700 --> 00:01:36.940
 get requests.

00:01:36.940 --> 00:01:41.780
 But certain actions like publishing a crate require authenticating with the registry.

00:01:41.780 --> 00:01:46.900
 As of this release, you can configure how cargo gets credentials for a registry using

00:01:46.900 --> 00:01:48.780
 credential providers.

00:01:48.780 --> 00:01:53.180
 Built-in providers are included for OS-specific secure secret storage.

00:01:53.180 --> 00:01:56.220
 On Mac OS, Linux, and Windows.

00:01:56.220 --> 00:01:58.860
 Additionally, custom providers can be written.

00:01:58.860 --> 00:02:02.020
 For example, there's a one password credential provider.

00:02:02.020 --> 00:02:06.980
 Using a secure credential provider reduces the risk of registry tokens leaking.

00:02:06.980 --> 00:02:12.660
 As of this release, registries can now optionally require authentication for all operations,

00:02:12.660 --> 00:02:15.700
 such as fetching dependencies, not just publishing.

00:02:15.700 --> 00:02:20.540
 This enables private cargo registries to offer more secure hosting for crates.

00:02:20.540 --> 00:02:25.380
 Note that if you are using a private registry, a credential provider must be configured.

00:02:25.380 --> 00:02:29.420
 The third major update in this release is improved opaque return types.

00:02:29.420 --> 00:02:35.100
 This is a subtle and complex feature, mostly relevant to advanced use cases involving lifetimes

00:02:35.100 --> 00:02:36.620
 and type relations.

00:02:36.620 --> 00:02:41.380
 In this example, we have a wrapper struct containing a reference to a generic type.

00:02:41.380 --> 00:02:46.140
 Then we define an implementation block for wrapper, which has an async function returning

00:02:46.140 --> 00:02:51.500
 self, and a regular function which returns something that implements iterator and yields

00:02:51.500 --> 00:02:53.460
 items of type self.

00:02:53.460 --> 00:02:58.220
 In previous versions of Rust, the compiler did not allow mentioning self in opaque return

00:02:58.220 --> 00:03:03.860
 types like async functions or returned import rates when the type those functions were defined

00:03:03.860 --> 00:03:05.900
 on contained references.

00:03:05.900 --> 00:03:08.740
 You may have encountered error messages like these.

00:03:08.740 --> 00:03:14.220
 Async function return type cannot contain a projection or self that references lifetimes

00:03:14.220 --> 00:03:15.820
 from a parent scope.

00:03:15.820 --> 00:03:20.140
 As of this release, this code simply just works, as you would expect.

00:03:20.140 --> 00:03:25.580
 This restriction is also lifted for associated types mentioned in opaque return types, which

00:03:25.580 --> 00:03:29.860
 previously caused similar errors, but now compile as expected.

00:03:29.860 --> 00:03:33.980
 If you want more information about this release, I'll include the official release blog post

00:03:33.980 --> 00:03:35.440
 in the description.

00:03:35.440 --> 00:03:39.700
 Before you go, make sure to get your free Rust cheat sheet at let's get rusty.com/chee

00:03:39.700 --> 00:03:40.700
 cheat sheet.

00:03:40.700 --> 00:03:44.300
 Let me know what your favorite feature was in the comment section below and subscribe to

00:03:44.300 --> 00:03:46.300
 the channel for more Rust content.

00:03:46.300 --> 00:03:48.940
 Hope you've enjoyed this video and remember to stay rusty.

00:03:48.940 --> 00:03:49.440
 Thank you.

00:03:49.440 --> 00:03:56.440
 for watching.

title: Cheater Billy Mitchell Is Running Scared
transcript:
WEBVTT

00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:05.200
 Hello you absolute legends! Back in July, I confidently announced to the world that the

00:00:05.200 --> 00:00:10.880
 Billy Mitchell vs. Twin Galaxy's trial would begin on October 27th, and by my calculations,

00:00:10.880 --> 00:00:16.320
 we are past that date, so naturally the trial should be well underway. And I've been seeing a

00:00:16.320 --> 00:00:21.520
 lot of comments from people excited for an update, and boy do I have an update for you.

00:00:21.520 --> 00:00:27.200
 The trial is insane. It is complete pandemonium, you will not believe what has happened.

00:00:27.200 --> 00:00:31.840
 If you thought Billy was crazy before, you've seen nothing yet. These are the types of things

00:00:31.840 --> 00:00:37.280
 I would have likely said if the trial had actually begun, but good old Billy has successfully delayed

00:00:37.280 --> 00:00:42.640
 the trial until next January. Though honestly, I would be shocked if it even happened then.

00:00:42.640 --> 00:00:48.640
 Billy is afraid, and his lawyers are really, really afraid. They do not want to go to trial,

00:00:48.640 --> 00:00:53.280
 because they know they will lose, so they are doing everything in their power to prolong the

00:00:53.280 --> 00:00:58.480
 lawsuit for as long as they can. Naturally, if Billy had a case, you'd think they would want to

00:00:58.480 --> 00:01:04.080
 get this sorted out as quickly as possible. I mean, Billy supposedly wants to prove to the world

00:01:04.080 --> 00:01:09.840
 that he didn't cheat, and that Twin Galaxy's were lying. Trial is his opportunity to do this.

00:01:09.840 --> 00:01:15.520
 The entire point of a defamation lawsuit is to show the public that what was said about you was wrong.

00:01:15.520 --> 00:01:20.160
 The entire point is to try and fix your public image and restore your reputation.

00:01:20.160 --> 00:01:25.440
 However, it seems as though Billy isn't really interested in that. All he wants to do is drag

00:01:25.440 --> 00:01:30.640
 things out for as long as possible, and do as much financial damage as he can to his opponents.

00:01:30.640 --> 00:01:34.880
 And he isn't just doing this with Twin Galaxy's, he is doing this with me too.

00:01:34.880 --> 00:01:40.720
 I've been trying to get a trial since June, but Billy keeps running away. He and his lawyers

00:01:40.720 --> 00:01:46.000
 always do something which makes the process take even longer, even though I've been ready to go

00:01:46.000 --> 00:01:51.760
 for months. On top of this, somehow I have become a central figure in the Twin Galaxy's lawsuit.

00:01:51.760 --> 00:01:57.120
 Billy's lawyers are making up insane lies about me and creating crazy conspiracy theories.

00:01:57.120 --> 00:02:01.280
 I honestly don't know if it's because they are legitimately dumb or because they are legitimately

00:02:01.280 --> 00:02:06.480
 scummy people. But whatever the case, whenever they bring up me in the legal filings, it seems

00:02:06.480 --> 00:02:11.440
 like there are a few drops to about 60. Billy's lawyers are so afraid they are even trying to

00:02:11.440 --> 00:02:16.480
 get the lawyer for Twin Galaxy's removed from the lawsuit. The only reason they would do this

00:02:16.480 --> 00:02:20.960
 is if they think it's beneficial to their case. If you think Billy's lawyers are just doing their

00:02:20.960 --> 00:02:26.800
 job, think again. These people are liars and scumbags. And I know this because they are lying

00:02:26.800 --> 00:02:32.000
 about me, and I know the truth. In this video, I will give you a quick update as to what's been

00:02:32.000 --> 00:02:38.080
 happening. I really hope you enjoy. Now legends, if you're anything like me, you're probably

00:02:38.080 --> 00:02:42.960
 losing a ton of money each month from subscriptions you just don't need. And that's where today's

00:02:42.960 --> 00:02:47.760
 sponsor Rocket Money is here to help. Rocket Money is an all-in-one finance platform that helps

00:02:47.760 --> 00:02:52.640
 you save more and spend less. This personal finance app allows you to manage subscriptions,

00:02:52.640 --> 00:02:58.400
 lower bills, build a custom budget, and grow your savings, all in one place, saving its members

00:02:58.400 --> 00:03:04.560
 over $1 billion and counting. Rocket Money helps you in many useful ways. It safely and securely

00:03:04.560 --> 00:03:09.360
 identifies recurring charges and cancels unwanted subscriptions for you. And it's as easy as a

00:03:09.360 --> 00:03:14.800
 simple tap. Rocket Money will also negotiate your bills for you from internet service bills to cable

00:03:14.800 --> 00:03:19.680
 and phone bills. It also helps you monitor your credit by alerting you of important changes that

00:03:19.680 --> 00:03:24.400
 impact your score. Plus many other features that will help you set budgets, set up smart savings,

00:03:24.400 --> 00:03:29.760
 and grow your net worth. To save more and spend less, join the over 5 million members using Rocket

00:03:29.760 --> 00:03:36.000
 Money today. Go to rocketmoney.com/cowjobs or click the link in the description to get started for free.

00:03:36.000 --> 00:03:42.480
 You can also unlock even more features with premium. That's rocketmoney.com/cowjobs to get started for

00:03:42.480 --> 00:03:48.880
 free. Lawsuits take a long time. There are a ton of steps involved, and lawyers have a habit of

00:03:48.880 --> 00:03:54.960
 waiting until the last minute to do things. But still, they can't last forever. They have to end

00:03:54.960 --> 00:04:00.240
 eventually. And normally, if you are the innocent party, you want it to end as soon as possible,

00:04:00.240 --> 00:04:06.000
 which in this case happens to be me. I want to go to trial, and I'm ready for trial. The only reason

00:04:06.000 --> 00:04:11.760
 I haven't had trial yet is because of Billy Mitchell. Back in June, I officially requested a trial date,

00:04:11.760 --> 00:04:17.680
 and then two weeks later, suddenly his lawyer retires, and he has to find new representation.

00:04:17.680 --> 00:04:22.080
 I mean, what are the odds that Billy's lawyer retired immediately after we asked to go to trial?

00:04:22.080 --> 00:04:26.000
 Surely he would have known earlier and was planning for it, but if that was the case,

00:04:26.000 --> 00:04:31.520
 why was he still representing Billy? Why did Billy get dropped? Literally, the moment the prospect of

00:04:31.520 --> 00:04:37.440
 trial was brought up. In any case, Billy found new lawyers, but of course, they wanted to delay

00:04:37.440 --> 00:04:43.200
 things so they had more time to prepare. I don't blame them, because Billy's original lawyer was

00:04:43.200 --> 00:04:48.800
 terrible. Absolutely terrible. I think Billy was trying to do things as cheaply as possible,

00:04:48.800 --> 00:04:54.240
 because the original complaint that was submitted is just astonishingly bad. The new lawyers probably

00:04:54.240 --> 00:04:59.520
 know it's bad, and they started to make changes. But the problem is that you can't just start making

00:04:59.520 --> 00:05:05.520
 changes to a complaint that is years old. It's completely unreasonable, and in many cases, against

00:05:05.520 --> 00:05:10.080
 the rules. So now we have to go through this battle to try and stop all these changes being made,

00:05:10.080 --> 00:05:15.840
 and it is again dragging things out. Thankfully, if Billy does amend his original complaint and I

00:05:15.840 --> 00:05:20.720
 have to draft a new defense, it looks like Billy will have to cover my costs in doing so.

00:05:20.720 --> 00:05:25.440
 So if he does keep amending his complaint, he'll be paying legal fees on both sides

00:05:25.440 --> 00:05:30.160
 until it's all resolved. Australia is really good when it comes to compensating costs.

00:05:30.160 --> 00:05:34.560
 If he changes something two years later, and then I have to spend more because of it,

00:05:34.560 --> 00:05:39.200
 the Australian court say that Billy needs to compensate me back for the extra effort.

00:05:39.200 --> 00:05:44.080
 So if Billy does keep messing around, delaying things, he will have to pay a lot of money.

00:05:44.080 --> 00:05:48.400
 But unfortunately for me, it just means I have to keep dealing with this for a lot longer.

00:05:48.400 --> 00:05:51.440
 But for my part, I am definitely ready to rock.

00:05:51.440 --> 00:05:59.120
 Originally the Twin Galaxies lawsuit was set for October, but again, Billy is running and hiding.

00:05:59.120 --> 00:06:05.200
 His lawyers successfully delayed it until November, and then they delayed it again until January.

00:06:05.200 --> 00:06:10.000
 Twin Galaxies wants to go to trial as soon as possible. Who wouldn't want to go to trial

00:06:10.000 --> 00:06:15.760
 against Billy Mitchell? It's the easiest slam dunk of all time. The man is a walking L.

00:06:15.760 --> 00:06:21.040
 Billy has no case, he has no evidence, and he has no witnesses. And funnily enough,

00:06:21.040 --> 00:06:26.080
 Billy's lawyers are blaming me for Billy having no one that's willing to lie on his behalf.

00:06:26.080 --> 00:06:30.640
 Yes, it's my fault that Billy can't get any witnesses to back up his story.

00:06:30.640 --> 00:06:35.840
 Recently, Billy's lawyers filed a motion to disqualify Tash, the lawyer for Twin Galaxies,

00:06:35.840 --> 00:06:41.360
 from the lawsuit. And one of the reasons is because Tash gave me access to depositions.

00:06:41.360 --> 00:06:46.400
 Billy claims his deposition was confidential, and his lawyers have already tried to argue this

00:06:46.400 --> 00:06:51.680
 in a previous motion. Previously they tried to hold Tash in contempt for providing depositions,

00:06:51.680 --> 00:06:56.400
 and the judge denied the order. Now they are doing the same thing again,

00:06:56.400 --> 00:07:00.080
 even though the judge has already ruled on this exact matter.

00:07:00.080 --> 00:07:04.080
 First of all, nothing marked confidential was sent to me, and second of all,

00:07:04.080 --> 00:07:09.600
 most of the materials I get don't even come from Tash, it comes from Twin Galaxies.

00:07:09.600 --> 00:07:14.400
 In Billy's recent motion, they claim that Tash sent me depositions for all of these people.

00:07:14.400 --> 00:07:19.200
 However, they are just making things up. Yes, Tash did send me a couple of depositions,

00:07:19.200 --> 00:07:24.080
 but most of the ones I've received didn't come from him. And yet, Billy's lawyers are happy to

00:07:24.080 --> 00:07:29.680
 make up lies with no evidence to try and get Tash disqualified. He claims that Tash continued

00:07:29.680 --> 00:07:34.400
 to send me depositions after he was informed it was a violation of the protective order,

00:07:34.400 --> 00:07:39.600
 but this is patently false. First, the deposition was not confidential, and again,

00:07:39.600 --> 00:07:45.360
 the judge has already ruled on that. And second, Tony's email to Tash was on July 14.

00:07:45.360 --> 00:07:51.520
 The last email me or my lawyers ever received from Tash was July 6, a week earlier. Everything

00:07:51.520 --> 00:07:56.720
 else I've ever gotten came from Twin Galaxies, not their lawyer. They claim that because I talk

00:07:56.720 --> 00:08:02.160
 about depositions in my videos, Billy can't get his friends to sit for deposition. They cite Billy's

00:08:02.160 --> 00:08:07.680
 friend Robert Childs, saying that he is afraid. But here's the thing about Rob Childs. Rob was

00:08:07.680 --> 00:08:13.440
 supposed to be deposed in January at the same time as Billy Mitchell, but just before his deposition,

00:08:13.440 --> 00:08:18.720
 he got a lawyer and avoided it, and has been trying desperately to avoid being asked questions.

00:08:18.720 --> 00:08:24.800
 So he was already unwilling to testify for Billy in January, which is half a year before I made

00:08:24.800 --> 00:08:30.720
 any videos about any depositions. Again, it's just another lie. They also claim that Triforce

00:08:30.720 --> 00:08:36.080
 won't sit for deposition for the same reason. They want us to believe that Triforce, the guy that

00:08:36.080 --> 00:08:41.360
 does public talks defending Billy, the guy that uploads YouTube videos to his own channel

00:08:41.360 --> 00:08:47.040
 defending Billy Mitchell, is afraid to defend Billy in a deposition because it will be uploaded

00:08:47.040 --> 00:08:52.960
 to the internet. This is what I mean when I say Billy's lawyers have an IQ of 60. They cannot grasp

 simple logic. Obviously, Triforce doesn't care if something is posted online, he does it himself.

00:08:58.960 --> 00:09:04.000
 On Twitter, he even acted as if deposing him wouldn't be a problem. It's only when Billy

00:09:04.000 --> 00:09:10.320
 wants to try to attack twin galaxies that Triforce is now suddenly camera shy. Of course, all of

00:09:10.320 --> 00:09:16.080
 this is irrelevant, however, because all Billy has to do is subpoena Rob Childs or Triforce,

 and they don't have a choice but to sit down for a deposition. But Billy won't subpoena them,

 because he knows they won't be able to keep all of their lies straight.

 Keep in mind, twin galaxies have always been very open about any information they have.

 They want the public to know as much as possible. Twin galaxies cares about the truth and wants

 the truth to be known, whatever that truth may be. So, twin galaxies provide any information that

 it can, and twin galaxies has had no problem getting witnesses to testify, because as it turns out,

 people are happy to tell their story when they aren't lying. It's only when people have to lie

 that answering questions becomes difficult. Billy Mitchell is the one that's trying to keep

00:09:57.760 --> 00:10:03.680
 all of this information suppressed. It's Billy Mitchell that is afraid of the truth coming out.

00:10:03.680 --> 00:10:08.000
 Billy's lawyers also lie about communications I've had with twin galaxies.

00:10:08.000 --> 00:10:12.640
 Billy was very upset about getting caught in the lie about the color of the joystick

00:10:12.640 --> 00:10:17.040
 at the mortgage broker's convention. They claim that twin galaxies should have given them the

00:10:22.960 --> 00:10:28.000
 and try to use it as proof that it was all an evil scheme. There are so many logical

 flaws in here, it's honestly hard to believe, so I'll just wrap it fire through the problems,

00:10:32.400 --> 00:10:37.280
 or we will be here all day. If you need to, you can pause my video to read my script first.

00:10:37.280 --> 00:10:42.080
 They say twin galaxies only sent them two emails from me during discovery,

00:10:42.080 --> 00:10:47.920
 but that's impossible because I knew about the photos. Therefore, this must be a giant cover-up.

00:10:47.920 --> 00:10:53.440
 Oh my god, a six-year-old could debunk this logic. I communicate with Jayce Hall through

00:10:53.440 --> 00:10:59.280
 Signal, which deletes messages after 10 minutes. They seem to forget that email isn't the only

00:10:59.280 --> 00:11:04.240
 form of communication. They quote me as saying I knew about the photos for years, which I have

00:11:04.240 --> 00:11:10.240
 just never said. What are they even quoting? Those two words don't appear in the quoted paragraph,

00:11:10.240 --> 00:11:16.640
 and I've never even said that. I just said I knew the photos existed. I never gave a time frame.

00:11:16.640 --> 00:11:21.440
 They think that because I knew twin galaxies had the photos since 2020, that means twin

00:11:21.440 --> 00:11:28.560
 galaxies must have told me in 2020. This is insanely stupid. Twin galaxies told me,

00:11:28.560 --> 00:11:34.400
 years later, they had the photos since 2020. Billy's lawyers haven't yet discovered the concept

00:11:34.400 --> 00:11:39.840
 of talking about past events. I knew about the photos beforehand, but that doesn't mean I knew

 because of twin galaxies either. Those photos have been in the public domain since 2011.

 Multiple people outside of twin galaxies independently had seen the photos, but truthfully,

 I saw the photos for the first time after Billy's deposition. Before that, I only knew that photos

00:11:58.320 --> 00:12:04.640
 showing a red joystick existed. I hadn't seen them myself, which is why in my video, I say I knew

00:12:04.640 --> 00:12:10.000
 about them, not that I had them or had seen them. They say that I said twin galaxies planned to

 withhold the photos so they could lay a trap. And apparently, I can only know this because twin

 galaxies told me. But twin galaxies didn't tell me that, it's just obvious from the deposition.

 Anyone with more than two brain cells who watches that deposition knows the questions they asked,

 only makes sense if they assumed Billy didn't have the photos. Obviously, twin galaxies didn't

 give Billy the photos. When I made my YouTube video, I was just typing it up to make it more

 interesting. And besides, this trap only works if Billy is a compulsive liar, which he just happens

 to be. Tony Elrod claims he asked for the photos as part of Discovery and refers to requests for

 production 36. This was asking for any documents supporting allegations made by twin galaxies in

 paragraph 25 of the cross complaint. That paragraph talks about a live performance on July 14.

 However, the photos were actually taken on July 13. So they aren't even on the same day,

 therefore they are not evidence Billy even played on July 14. And couldn't support that claim in

 any way. All those photos show is Billy standing in front of a Donkey Kong machine the day prior.

 They don't confirm he played it, they don't even confirm that it was the machining question.

 It is impossible to determine if that machine relates to his July 14 score. In his lawsuit,

00:13:29.840 --> 00:13:35.360
 Billy claims he played on an unmodified machine. So based on what Billy had previously said,

00:13:35.360 --> 00:13:40.160
 as far as twin galaxies knew, that machine couldn't have been the one he played on,

00:13:40.160 --> 00:13:45.760
 because that machine was modified. It wasn't until Billy confirmed himself that it was the machine

00:13:45.760 --> 00:13:51.120
 he used that the photos became relevant. But do you want to know what the best part of the

00:13:51.120 --> 00:13:58.480
 red joystick saga is? Billy did actually know the photos existed, and he even already had them

00:13:58.480 --> 00:14:04.800
 himself. Now I know what you're thinking. How the fuck is it possible that Billy had the photos

00:14:04.800 --> 00:14:09.760
 and still lied about the color of the stick and fell for the trap? Well my friend,

00:14:09.760 --> 00:14:14.240
 there are just some things us mortal men can simply never grasp or comprehend.

00:14:14.240 --> 00:14:21.200
 All we can try to do is know the facts. In 2018, Billy called David race and said the convention had

00:14:21.200 --> 00:14:50.560
 photos. Here's a clip from that phone call. Then in August,

00:14:50.560 --> 00:14:57.120
 2022, five months before his deposition, Billy subpoenaed the convention and got the photos. So

00:14:57.120 --> 00:15:02.960
 Billy already had them. And still in his deposition, not only did he say he didn't have photos.

00:15:15.520 --> 00:15:34.880
 But he still said the stick was black. There are multiple levels of stupidity running

00:15:34.880 --> 00:15:40.640
 concurrently here. And you know what's interesting? When Tash asked Billy if he had photos and Billy

00:15:40.640 --> 00:15:46.720
 said no, who was sitting right next to Billy? Billy's lawyer, Tony Elrod. So Tony was happy to

00:15:46.720 --> 00:15:51.360
 sit there and listen to his client lie and was happy to keep the fact that he had the photos a

00:15:51.360 --> 00:15:57.600
 secret, but when Twin Galaxes traps a compulsive liar, now that becomes a problem. Tony Elrod

 complains about Tash for various things, like messaging Billy's witnesses trying to get them to

00:16:02.640 --> 00:16:09.360
 send evidence or testify, or showing emotion in his email correspondence. But he himself has done

00:16:09.360 --> 00:16:15.360
 far worse. Tony lied directly to a witness about what Billy Mitchell had said in his deposition,

00:16:15.360 --> 00:16:19.840
 in order to try and coerce the witness into changing their testimony, because what the

00:16:19.840 --> 00:16:25.440
 witness was saying was so damaging to Billy's case. Elrod is happy to send over fabricated

00:16:25.440 --> 00:16:31.360
 evidence and lie on behalf of his client, and when exposed, simply say that it's all a conspiracy

00:16:31.360 --> 00:16:36.720
 theory. Billy's lawyers are going after Tash because Tash is good, and they know they will be

00:16:36.720 --> 00:16:42.320
 destroyed at trial. Billy and his lawyer Tony Elrod are cowards doing everything they can,

00:16:42.320 --> 00:16:47.440
 trying to prevent this entire pathetic lawsuit from being shown to a jury. Everyone knows they

00:16:47.440 --> 00:16:53.600
 will lose, including them, and they are desperate. And I really hope Tony Elrod improves his

00:16:53.600 --> 00:16:58.800
 comprehension skills and gets his facts straight before talking about me again in his frivolous

00:16:58.800 --> 00:17:03.440
 lawsuit. I will let you know when any further updates happen. Thank you so much for watching

00:17:03.440 --> 00:17:11.040
 you legends. I hope you're having a fantastic day, and I will see you in the next video.

title: Cheater Billy Mitchell Is Running Scared
transcript:
WEBVTT

00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:05.200
 Hello you absolute legends! Back in July, I confidently announced to the world that the

00:00:05.200 --> 00:00:10.880
 Billy Mitchell vs. Twin Galaxy's trial would begin on October 27th, and by my calculations,

00:00:10.880 --> 00:00:16.320
 we are past that date, so naturally the trial should be well underway. And I've been seeing a

00:00:16.320 --> 00:00:21.520
 lot of comments from people excited for an update, and boy do I have an update for you.

00:00:21.520 --> 00:00:27.200
 The trial is insane. It is complete pandemonium, you will not believe what has happened.

00:00:27.200 --> 00:00:31.840
 If you thought Billy was crazy before, you've seen nothing yet. These are the types of things

00:00:31.840 --> 00:00:37.280
 I would have likely said if the trial had actually begun, but good old Billy has successfully delayed

00:00:37.280 --> 00:00:42.640
 the trial until next January. Though honestly, I would be shocked if it even happened then.

00:00:42.640 --> 00:00:48.640
 Billy is afraid, and his lawyers are really, really afraid. They do not want to go to trial,

00:00:48.640 --> 00:00:53.280
 because they know they will lose, so they are doing everything in their power to prolong the

00:00:53.280 --> 00:00:58.480
 lawsuit for as long as they can. Naturally, if Billy had a case, you'd think they would want to

00:00:58.480 --> 00:01:04.080
 get this sorted out as quickly as possible. I mean, Billy supposedly wants to prove to the world

00:01:04.080 --> 00:01:09.840
 that he didn't cheat, and that Twin Galaxy's were lying. Trial is his opportunity to do this.

00:01:09.840 --> 00:01:15.520
 The entire point of a defamation lawsuit is to show the public that what was said about you was wrong.

00:01:15.520 --> 00:01:20.160
 The entire point is to try and fix your public image and restore your reputation.

00:01:20.160 --> 00:01:25.440
 However, it seems as though Billy isn't really interested in that. All he wants to do is drag

00:01:25.440 --> 00:01:30.640
 things out for as long as possible, and do as much financial damage as he can to his opponents.

00:01:30.640 --> 00:01:34.880
 And he isn't just doing this with Twin Galaxy's, he is doing this with me too.

00:01:34.880 --> 00:01:40.720
 I've been trying to get a trial since June, but Billy keeps running away. He and his lawyers

00:01:40.720 --> 00:01:46.000
 always do something which makes the process take even longer, even though I've been ready to go

00:01:46.000 --> 00:01:51.760
 for months. On top of this, somehow I have become a central figure in the Twin Galaxy's lawsuit.

00:01:51.760 --> 00:01:57.120
 Billy's lawyers are making up insane lies about me and creating crazy conspiracy theories.

00:01:57.120 --> 00:02:01.280
 I honestly don't know if it's because they are legitimately dumb or because they are legitimately

00:02:01.280 --> 00:02:06.480
 scummy people. But whatever the case, whenever they bring up me in the legal filings, it seems

00:02:06.480 --> 00:02:11.440
 like there are a few drops to about 60. Billy's lawyers are so afraid they are even trying to

00:02:11.440 --> 00:02:16.480
 get the lawyer for Twin Galaxy's removed from the lawsuit. The only reason they would do this

00:02:16.480 --> 00:02:20.960
 is if they think it's beneficial to their case. If you think Billy's lawyers are just doing their

00:02:20.960 --> 00:02:26.800
 job, think again. These people are liars and scumbags. And I know this because they are lying

00:02:26.800 --> 00:02:32.000
 about me, and I know the truth. In this video, I will give you a quick update as to what's been

00:02:32.000 --> 00:02:38.080
 happening. I really hope you enjoy. Now legends, if you're anything like me, you're probably

00:02:38.080 --> 00:02:42.960
 losing a ton of money each month from subscriptions you just don't need. And that's where today's

00:02:42.960 --> 00:02:47.760
 sponsor Rocket Money is here to help. Rocket Money is an all-in-one finance platform that helps

00:02:47.760 --> 00:02:52.640
 you save more and spend less. This personal finance app allows you to manage subscriptions,

00:02:52.640 --> 00:02:58.400
 lower bills, build a custom budget, and grow your savings, all in one place, saving its members

00:02:58.400 --> 00:03:04.560
 over $1 billion and counting. Rocket Money helps you in many useful ways. It safely and securely

00:03:04.560 --> 00:03:09.360
 identifies recurring charges and cancels unwanted subscriptions for you. And it's as easy as a

00:03:09.360 --> 00:03:14.800
 simple tap. Rocket Money will also negotiate your bills for you from internet service bills to cable

00:03:14.800 --> 00:03:19.680
 and phone bills. It also helps you monitor your credit by alerting you of important changes that

00:03:19.680 --> 00:03:24.400
 impact your score. Plus many other features that will help you set budgets, set up smart savings,

00:03:24.400 --> 00:03:29.760
 and grow your net worth. To save more and spend less, join the over 5 million members using Rocket

00:03:29.760 --> 00:03:36.000
 Money today. Go to rocketmoney.com/cowjobs or click the link in the description to get started for free.

00:03:36.000 --> 00:03:42.480
 You can also unlock even more features with premium. That's rocketmoney.com/cowjobs to get started for

00:03:42.480 --> 00:03:48.880
 free. Lawsuits take a long time. There are a ton of steps involved, and lawyers have a habit of

00:03:48.880 --> 00:03:54.960
 waiting until the last minute to do things. But still, they can't last forever. They have to end

00:03:54.960 --> 00:04:00.240
 eventually. And normally, if you are the innocent party, you want it to end as soon as possible,

00:04:00.240 --> 00:04:06.000
 which in this case happens to be me. I want to go to trial, and I'm ready for trial. The only reason

00:04:06.000 --> 00:04:11.760
 I haven't had trial yet is because of Billy Mitchell. Back in June, I officially requested a trial date,

00:04:11.760 --> 00:04:17.680
 and then two weeks later, suddenly his lawyer retires, and he has to find new representation.

00:04:17.680 --> 00:04:22.080
 I mean, what are the odds that Billy's lawyer retired immediately after we asked to go to trial?

00:04:22.080 --> 00:04:26.000
 Surely he would have known earlier and was planning for it, but if that was the case,

00:04:26.000 --> 00:04:31.520
 why was he still representing Billy? Why did Billy get dropped? Literally, the moment the prospect of

00:04:31.520 --> 00:04:37.440
 trial was brought up. In any case, Billy found new lawyers, but of course, they wanted to delay

00:04:37.440 --> 00:04:43.200
 things so they had more time to prepare. I don't blame them, because Billy's original lawyer was

00:04:43.200 --> 00:04:48.800
 terrible. Absolutely terrible. I think Billy was trying to do things as cheaply as possible,

00:04:48.800 --> 00:04:54.240
 because the original complaint that was submitted is just astonishingly bad. The new lawyers probably

00:04:54.240 --> 00:04:59.520
 know it's bad, and they started to make changes. But the problem is that you can't just start making

00:04:59.520 --> 00:05:05.520
 changes to a complaint that is years old. It's completely unreasonable, and in many cases, against

00:05:05.520 --> 00:05:10.080
 the rules. So now we have to go through this battle to try and stop all these changes being made,

00:05:10.080 --> 00:05:15.840
 and it is again dragging things out. Thankfully, if Billy does amend his original complaint and I

00:05:15.840 --> 00:05:20.720
 have to draft a new defense, it looks like Billy will have to cover my costs in doing so.

00:05:20.720 --> 00:05:25.440
 So if he does keep amending his complaint, he'll be paying legal fees on both sides

00:05:25.440 --> 00:05:30.160
 until it's all resolved. Australia is really good when it comes to compensating costs.

00:05:30.160 --> 00:05:34.560
 If he changes something two years later, and then I have to spend more because of it,

00:05:34.560 --> 00:05:39.200
 the Australian court say that Billy needs to compensate me back for the extra effort.

00:05:39.200 --> 00:05:44.080
 So if Billy does keep messing around, delaying things, he will have to pay a lot of money.

00:05:44.080 --> 00:05:48.400
 But unfortunately for me, it just means I have to keep dealing with this for a lot longer.

00:05:48.400 --> 00:05:51.440
 But for my part, I am definitely ready to rock.

00:05:51.440 --> 00:05:59.120
 Originally the Twin Galaxies lawsuit was set for October, but again, Billy is running and hiding.

00:05:59.120 --> 00:06:05.200
 His lawyers successfully delayed it until November, and then they delayed it again until January.

00:06:05.200 --> 00:06:10.000
 Twin Galaxies wants to go to trial as soon as possible. Who wouldn't want to go to trial

00:06:10.000 --> 00:06:15.760
 against Billy Mitchell? It's the easiest slam dunk of all time. The man is a walking L.

00:06:15.760 --> 00:06:21.040
 Billy has no case, he has no evidence, and he has no witnesses. And funnily enough,

00:06:21.040 --> 00:06:26.080
 Billy's lawyers are blaming me for Billy having no one that's willing to lie on his behalf.

00:06:26.080 --> 00:06:30.640
 Yes, it's my fault that Billy can't get any witnesses to back up his story.

00:06:30.640 --> 00:06:35.840
 Recently, Billy's lawyers filed a motion to disqualify Tash, the lawyer for Twin Galaxies,

00:06:35.840 --> 00:06:41.360
 from the lawsuit. And one of the reasons is because Tash gave me access to depositions.

00:06:41.360 --> 00:06:46.400
 Billy claims his deposition was confidential, and his lawyers have already tried to argue this

00:06:46.400 --> 00:06:51.680
 in a previous motion. Previously they tried to hold Tash in contempt for providing depositions,

00:06:51.680 --> 00:06:56.400
 and the judge denied the order. Now they are doing the same thing again,

00:06:56.400 --> 00:07:00.080
 even though the judge has already ruled on this exact matter.

00:07:00.080 --> 00:07:04.080
 First of all, nothing marked confidential was sent to me, and second of all,

00:07:04.080 --> 00:07:09.600
 most of the materials I get don't even come from Tash, it comes from Twin Galaxies.

00:07:09.600 --> 00:07:14.400
 In Billy's recent motion, they claim that Tash sent me depositions for all of these people.

00:07:14.400 --> 00:07:19.200
 However, they are just making things up. Yes, Tash did send me a couple of depositions,

00:07:19.200 --> 00:07:24.080
 but most of the ones I've received didn't come from him. And yet, Billy's lawyers are happy to

00:07:24.080 --> 00:07:29.680
 make up lies with no evidence to try and get Tash disqualified. He claims that Tash continued

00:07:29.680 --> 00:07:34.400
 to send me depositions after he was informed it was a violation of the protective order,

00:07:34.400 --> 00:07:39.600
 but this is patently false. First, the deposition was not confidential, and again,

00:07:39.600 --> 00:07:45.360
 the judge has already ruled on that. And second, Tony's email to Tash was on July 14.

00:07:45.360 --> 00:07:51.520
 The last email me or my lawyers ever received from Tash was July 6, a week earlier. Everything

00:07:51.520 --> 00:07:56.720
 else I've ever gotten came from Twin Galaxies, not their lawyer. They claim that because I talk

00:07:56.720 --> 00:08:02.160
 about depositions in my videos, Billy can't get his friends to sit for deposition. They cite Billy's

00:08:02.160 --> 00:08:07.680
 friend Robert Childs, saying that he is afraid. But here's the thing about Rob Childs. Rob was

00:08:07.680 --> 00:08:13.440
 supposed to be deposed in January at the same time as Billy Mitchell, but just before his deposition,

00:08:13.440 --> 00:08:18.720
 he got a lawyer and avoided it, and has been trying desperately to avoid being asked questions.

00:08:18.720 --> 00:08:24.800
 So he was already unwilling to testify for Billy in January, which is half a year before I made

00:08:24.800 --> 00:08:30.720
 any videos about any depositions. Again, it's just another lie. They also claim that Triforce

00:08:30.720 --> 00:08:36.080
 won't sit for deposition for the same reason. They want us to believe that Triforce, the guy that

00:08:36.080 --> 00:08:41.360
 does public talks defending Billy, the guy that uploads YouTube videos to his own channel

00:08:41.360 --> 00:08:47.040
 defending Billy Mitchell, is afraid to defend Billy in a deposition because it will be uploaded

00:08:47.040 --> 00:08:52.960
 to the internet. This is what I mean when I say Billy's lawyers have an IQ of 60. They cannot grasp

00:08:52.960 --> 00:08:58.960
 simple logic. Obviously, Triforce doesn't care if something is posted online, he does it himself.

00:08:58.960 --> 00:09:04.000
 On Twitter, he even acted as if deposing him wouldn't be a problem. It's only when Billy

00:09:04.000 --> 00:09:10.320
 wants to try to attack twin galaxies that Triforce is now suddenly camera shy. Of course, all of

00:09:10.320 --> 00:09:16.080
 this is irrelevant, however, because all Billy has to do is subpoena Rob Childs or Triforce,

00:09:16.080 --> 00:09:21.760
 and they don't have a choice but to sit down for a deposition. But Billy won't subpoena them,

00:09:21.760 --> 00:09:25.680
 because he knows they won't be able to keep all of their lies straight.

00:09:25.680 --> 00:09:30.720
 Keep in mind, twin galaxies have always been very open about any information they have.

00:09:30.720 --> 00:09:35.840
 They want the public to know as much as possible. Twin galaxies cares about the truth and wants

00:09:35.840 --> 00:09:41.600
 the truth to be known, whatever that truth may be. So, twin galaxies provide any information that

00:09:41.600 --> 00:09:48.000
 it can, and twin galaxies has had no problem getting witnesses to testify, because as it turns out,

00:09:48.000 --> 00:09:53.200
 people are happy to tell their story when they aren't lying. It's only when people have to lie

00:09:53.200 --> 00:09:57.760
 that answering questions becomes difficult. Billy Mitchell is the one that's trying to keep

00:09:57.760 --> 00:10:03.680
 all of this information suppressed. It's Billy Mitchell that is afraid of the truth coming out.

00:10:03.680 --> 00:10:08.000
 Billy's lawyers also lie about communications I've had with twin galaxies.

00:10:08.000 --> 00:10:12.640
 Billy was very upset about getting caught in the lie about the color of the joystick

00:10:12.640 --> 00:10:17.040
 at the mortgage broker's convention. They claim that twin galaxies should have given them the

00:10:17.040 --> 00:10:22.960
 photos beforehand, and that tricking Billy was morally wrong. They take a portion of my video

00:10:22.960 --> 00:10:28.000
 and try to use it as proof that it was all an evil scheme. There are so many logical

00:10:28.000 --> 00:10:32.400
 flaws in here, it's honestly hard to believe, so I'll just wrap it fire through the problems,

00:10:32.400 --> 00:10:37.280
 or we will be here all day. If you need to, you can pause my video to read my script first.

00:10:37.280 --> 00:10:42.080
 They say twin galaxies only sent them two emails from me during discovery,

00:10:42.080 --> 00:10:47.920
 but that's impossible because I knew about the photos. Therefore, this must be a giant cover-up.

00:10:47.920 --> 00:10:53.440
 Oh my god, a six-year-old could debunk this logic. I communicate with Jayce Hall through

00:10:53.440 --> 00:10:59.280
 Signal, which deletes messages after 10 minutes. They seem to forget that email isn't the only

00:10:59.280 --> 00:11:04.240
 form of communication. They quote me as saying I knew about the photos for years, which I have

00:11:04.240 --> 00:11:10.240
